description: This file contains functions for configuring VLANs on different switch types, interacting with system scripts, and managing VLAN-related system calls. It includes external dependencies and makes system calls to handle VLAN setup and teardown, primarily for a network switch or similar device.

methods.name: int configVlan_ESW(PSWFabHALArg args,int numArgs,BOOL up)
methods.description: Configures VLANs on external switch ports by invoking system scripts or commands, based on the 'up' flag indicating VLAN activation or deactivation.

methods.name: int configVlan_WiFi(PSWFabHALArg args,int numArgs,BOOL up)
methods.description: Configures VLANs for WiFi interfaces similarly by invoking system scripts, distinguished by the 'up' flag.

methods.name: int stringIDIntSw(void * portID,char * stringbuf,int bufSize)
methods.description: Converts a switch port ID to a string identifier for internal switches.

methods.name: int eventIDSw(void * portID,char * stringbuf,int bufSize)
methods.description: Gets event ID from switch port ID string.

methods.name: int stringIDExtSw(void * portID,char * stringbuf,int bufSize)
methods.description: Converts a switch port ID to a string identifier for external switches.

methods.name: int configVlan_ISW(PSWFabHALArg args,int numArgs,BOOL up)
methods.description: Configures VLANs on internal switch ports, handling tagged/untagged ports and invoking system commands accordingly.

ctags.name: configVlan_ESW
ctags.pattern: /^int configVlan_ESW(PSWFabHALArg args, int numArgs, BOOL up) $/

ctags.name: configVlan_ISW
ctags.pattern: /^int configVlan_ISW(PSWFabHALArg args, int numArgs, BOOL up) $/

ctags.name: configVlan_WiFi
ctags.pattern: /^int configVlan_WiFi(PSWFabHALArg args, int numArgs, BOOL up) $/

ctags.name: eventIDSw
ctags.pattern: /^int eventIDSw (void* portID, char* stringbuf, int bufSize) {$/

ctags.name: stringIDExtSw
ctags.pattern: /^int stringIDExtSw (void* portID, char* stringbuf, int bufSize) {$/

ctags.name: stringIDIntSw
ctags.pattern: /^int stringIDIntSw (void* portID, char* stringbuf, int bufSize) {$/
